metadata.title: CVE-2022-27672 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
When SMT is enabled, certain AMD processors may speculatively executeinstructions using a target from the sibling thread after an SMT modeswitch potentially resulting in information disclosure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-156-generic - 5.4.0-156.173
linux-image-5.4.0-156-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-156.173
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-156-generic - 5.4.0-156.173
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-156-lowlatency - 5.4.0-156.173
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-72-generic - 5.15.0-72.79~20.04.1
